mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(midx, noticeSubject, noticeCategory, noticeArticle, noticeFileName, noticeFilePath) VALUES(#{midx}, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeArticle}, #{noticeUploadedFileName}, #{noticeFilePath})
mapper.select: SELECT nidx, noticeSubject, noticeCategory, noticeWriteday FROM notice WHERE noticeYN='N' order by 1 desc
SELECT nidx, noticeSubject, noticeCategory, convert(noticeArticle using utf8) as noticeArticle, noticeFileName, noticeFilePath, noticeWriteday FROM notice WHERE nidx = #{nidx}
